item.patchouli:guide_book.name: Guide Book
item.patchouli:guide_book.landing: Welcome to my Mod Pack. $(br2)In this guide book I have written a few things to do and given links to where to find more infomation.
item.patchouli:guide_book.categories.fir: So you just started and need advice.
item.patchouli:guide_book.categories.gad: A list of the useful Tools and Items
item.patchouli:guide_book.categories.exp: A few things of note you might encounter while exporting.
item.patchouli:guide_book.entries.first_: Who doesn't need more storage?$(br2)Once you have equipped it in your backpack slot, open it by pressing $(k:backpack).$(br2)See Shulker Box entry for larger storage options.
Sleep without setting a spawn point.$(br2)Can be dyed for more style points. *Style points are imaginary*
